\documentclass[twoside,english]{elsarticle}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[a4paper]{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=2cm,bmargin=3.2cm,lmargin=2cm,rmargin=2cm,columnsep=1.2cm}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amsthm}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{itemize}
\item The predecessor problem on ``smooth'' distribution families is analyzed.
\item A conceptually simpler data structure is proposed to solve it.
\item The range of allowed input distributions is extended.\end{itemize}

\end{document}
